accounts.name: defender_pool
docs: Defender's pool - created if doesn't exist

accounts.name: dispute
docs: Optional: Active dispute (for updating bond_at_risk during dispute)

accounts.name: dispute
docs: Optional: Active dispute (for updating bond_at_risk during dispute)

instructions.name: add_to_vote
docs: Add stake to an existing vote

instructions.name: create_dispute
docs: Create a dispute against a subject

accounts.name: challenger_pool
docs: Challenger's pool - created if doesn't exist

accounts.name: creator_defender_record
docs: Creator's defender record for this round - init_if_needed for pool contribution

instructions.name: create_subject
docs: Create a subject with Subject + Dispute + Escrow PDAs
Creator's pool is linked. If initial_bond > 0, transfers from wallet.

accounts.name: defender_pool
docs: Creator's defender pool - created if doesn't exist

instructions.name: initialize_config
docs: Initialize protocol config (one-time setup by deployer)

instructions.name: join_challengers
docs: Join existing dispute as additional challenger

accounts.name: challenger_pool
docs: Challenger's pool - created if doesn't exist

instructions.name: resolve_dispute
docs: Resolve a dispute after voting period ends

instructions.name: submit_restore
docs: Submit a restoration request for an invalidated subject

accounts.name: challenger_record
docs: Challenger record for the restorer (acts as first challenger)

instructions.name: unlock_juror_stake
docs: Unlock juror stake (7 days after resolution)

instructions.name: update_max_bond
docs: Update max_bond setting for defender pool

types.name: ChallengerPool
docs: Challenger's pool for holding stake funds

types.name: ChallengerRecord
docs: Individual challenger's stake for a specific subject round
Created per round, closed after claim

fields.name: subject_id
docs: The subject_id this record belongs to

fields.name: round
docs: Which round this stake is for

fields.name: stake
docs: Stake amount contributed to the dispute

types.name: DefenderPool
docs: Defender's pool for holding bond funds

fields.name: balance
docs: Available balance (not locked in active bonds)

types.name: DefenderRecord
docs: Individual defender's bond for a specific subject round
Created per round, closed after claim

fields.name: subject_id
docs: The subject_id this record belongs to

fields.name: round
docs: Which round this bond is for

types.name: Dispute
docs: Dispute - Persistent PDA, reset after each round

fields.name: subject_id
docs: Subject being disputed (subject_id, not Subject PDA)

fields.name: round
docs: Which round this dispute is for

fields.name: bond_at_risk
docs: Bond at risk (calculated based on mode)

fields.name: defender_count
docs: Number of defenders (snapshot at dispute creation, updated if new defenders join)

fields.name: is_restore
docs: True if this dispute is a restoration request

fields.name: restore_stake
docs: Stake posted by restorer (for restorations only)

fields.name: details_cid
docs: Details CID (IPFS hash for dispute details)

types.name: Escrow
docs: Escrow account - holds funds for claims across rounds

fields.name: rounds
docs: Vec grows with realloc on dispute creation, shrinks on last claim

types.name: JurorPool
docs: Juror's pool for holding voting stake

types.name: JurorRecord
docs: Juror's vote record for a specific subject round
Created per round, closed after claim

fields.name: subject_id
docs: The subject_id this record belongs to

fields.name: round
docs: Which round this vote is for

fields.name: restore_choice
docs: Vote choice for restorations (only used when is_restore_vote is true)

fields.name: is_restore_vote
docs: Whether this is a restoration vote

fields.name: stake_unlocked
docs: Whether stake has been unlocked (7 days after voting ends)

types.name: ProtocolConfig
docs: Stores treasury address and admin authority for fee collection

fields.name: authority
docs: Admin who can update config (deployer initially)

types.name: RoundResult
docs: Result data for a completed round, stored in Escrow
Used for claim calculations after resolution

fields.name: creator
docs: Dispute creator (for rent refund on last claim or sweep)

fields.name: safe_bond
docs: Safe bond (available_bond - bond_at_risk) returned to defenders

fields.name: defender_claims
docs: Number of defenders who have claimed

fields.name: challenger_claims
docs: Number of challengers who have claimed

fields.name: juror_claims
docs: Number of jurors who have claimed

types.name: Subject
docs: Subject that defenders back - identified by subject_id
Persistent PDA - created once, reused across rounds

fields.name: subject_id
docs: Subject identifier (could be PDA from external program)

fields.name: creator
docs: Creator of this subject (for auto-bond on reset)

fields.name: details_cid
docs: Content CID (IPFS hash for subject details)

fields.name: available_bond
docs: Total bond available for current round

fields.name: defender_count
docs: Number of defenders in current round

fields.name: match_mode
docs: Match mode: true = bond_at_risk matches stake, false = proportionate (all bond at risk)

fields.name: voting_period
docs: Voting period in seconds for this subject's disputes

fields.name: last_dispute_total
docs: Previous dispute's (stake + bond) - minimum stake required for restoration

fields.name: last_voting_period
docs: Previous dispute's voting period - restorations use 2x this value
